scripts.deploy: npm run build && aws s3 sync build/ s3://randomwebsite.xyz --profile acloudguru --acl public-read
scripts.serverless-upload: npm run clean && npm run zip && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name arn:aws:lambda:us-east-1:680637963852:function:cloudguruServerless --zip-file fileb://lambda/build/build.zip --profile acloudguru
